name: Blood-Debt Directive
description:
After your character receives DMG: Attach 1 stack of Bond of Life to the character who took DMG and the opponent's Arlecchino.
Usage(s): 5
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After your character receives DMG:</color> Attach 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C122]</color> to the character who took DMG and the opponent's $[A1314].\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 5</color>
